Comments_List: I learned some basic rules of Latin grammar and can begin to translate Latin passages.  From learning Latin vocab, Im also figuring out roots to English words.
I gained proficiency in translating and writing latin passages.
LATN 110 helped me develop a better understanding of the fundamental elements of language in a rigorous sense.
A solid beginning to Latin grammar and syntax

I wish the Latin textbook we used had an answer key, so it would be easier to do practice at home when preparing to tests and quizzes.  I also wish there would be a fairer balance of students who are new to the language in the class since there were definitely people in there who had previously been exposed to Latin which made the class speed up.
More challenging translation, less reliance on workbook exercises, eliminate the Monday lab class.
If they are willing to make the time commitment to the course, then yes because you get a whole new look on grammar.
